      • getUserIdByUserName

        public String getUserIdByUserName(String userName)
                           throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException,
                                  org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Description copied from interface: UserRegistry
        Retrieves a user ID according to a given user name. If multiple users happen to have the same user name, the first one is returned.
        Specified by:
        getUserIdByUserName in interface UserRegistry
        Returns:
        User ID
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - If no user with the given user name could be found.
